org.amino.mcas
Class LockFreeBSTree<T,V>

java.lang.Object
  org.amino.mcas.LockFreeBSTree<T,V>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of key
V - Type value
public class LockFreeBSTree<T,V>
extends java.lang.Object

Lockfree binary search tree. It is based on Practical lock-freedom by Keir Fraser. Implemented by MCAS.

Author:
Xiao Jun Dai

                T key,

remove

public V remove(LockFreeBSTree<T,V> tree,
                T key)
Remove key in the tree. deletion is the most time-consuming operation to implement because of the number of different tree configurations which must be handled.

Parameters:
tree - tree with key needed to be removed
key - key to be removed
Returns:
value with key, otherwise null

isEmpty

public boolean isEmpty()
Is the tree empty?

Returns:
true if the tree is empty, otherwise false
